reviews.text: Booked 6 rooms ahead of time at this motel because 6 couples from our local car club are touring for 2 weeks and wanted to tour the Boeing factory. Difficult to get into parking lot, sarcastic desk clerk, stained sheets, and shabby appearance best describe this motel. They kept 1 person's credit card by mistake and would not return it although they promised to so he had to cancel it after 3 days without it. Not a place any of us would return to.
reviews.title: Terrible motel and staff

likes.disliked: — unwelcoming check-in clerk, shabby appearance, advertised WiFi not working, stained sheets and poor assistance in replacing them.

reviews.text: We stayed at several Days Inns on a road trip through Washington, and this was the most expensive and the most disappointing. We are budget travelers, so we don't usually pick--but for the money we spent, I will point out the problems we found here. Mattresses were really uncomfortable. The place is old and rundown and new paint cannot hide that. The temperature control on the heat/ac unit is not good--either you fry with the heat on--running forever!!--or you freeze when you turn it off. Hot or Cold. No in-between comfortable temperature. It's just not worth the money. We stayed for one night because we were tired and our first choice didn't work out and we were running out of options. I would not stay here again.
reviews.title: Overpriced!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night in this hotel, and that was one night too many. From the female 'guest' in a room above us who appeared to be running a 'business' in her room (only a guess, after she offered us a 'date' for the evening...), to the mildew in the batroom and the stains on the bed skirts, this was a total rip-off and not anywhere up to Day's Inn standards.
reviews.title: Is there an extra charge for the mildew?
Terrible experience
reviews.text: We'll never return. I'd rather sleep in my car. We moved down the street to Motel 6, a far, FAR classier place than this.

I'm in the travel - tour industry, as a Director of Product , & have dealt with thousands of hotels over a 30 yrs career. When on a short personal trip, my expectation when spontaeously choosing an off the Hwy motel for an overnight enroute is not high, and I am not nit picky. However, this motel room was dirty, deep filth, a hole in the shower curtain the size of a cannon ball - how could a maid not notice that? Sacks of garbage lined up outside doors and stairwells. Cig burns in the bedspread, spills over mattress and walls. Not worth grieving over...except when it came to 11:04am, a phone call to the room (I was awaiting my sister to pick me up, which would be within 15 minutes - she, my traveling mate on the road had to rush her dog to the vet at 9am) I was told by the Manager, " Lady, I can have you removed from the room"...Never, in my life have I been so rudely treated, especially from someone running a dumpy hotel, with drunks and low life bellowing from open doors. Although, the Quinta had kindly called over to find out the pet policy at this hotel, and to make my reservation I was accused of being ' a liar", deceitfully harbouring a dog"....It was absolutely outrageous, the treatment, and the deplorable conditions of this seedy motel. My purpose in bothering writing this, is simply to alert travelers to stay clear of this property. Try the Days Inn in Arlington, who are pet friendly and also to humans!
reviews.title: Great place - neat and clean

likes.disliked: — Difficult to trun left while driving out of the motel.

reviews.text: I and my wife stayed here and after reading the previous reviews decided to try it for one night as we had to take care of work near there. I do not know which motel the previous reviewers are talking about but this place is one of the cleanest motels in the class of Days Inns. We were so happy with this place that we decided to stay for another night. The lobby is huge and very clean with nice sofas. It is connected to the dining room which is again huge with ample tables and chairs for eating breakfast. This motel is located next to a nice mall. The room was clean with fridge and micro and the front desk staff was very courtious, professional and worked with a smile on their face. Would stay here again on next trip.
reviews.title: Horrible
